template.explanation: Condition on Group A: total A = a + b. So P(X | A) = a/(a + b).

template.stem: The mean of {{n}} numbers is {{M}}. If a new number {{v}} is added, what is the new mean?

template.stem: Brand A sells {{a_qty}} ounces for ${{a_price}}. Brand B sells {{b_qty}} ounces for ${{b_price}}. Which has the lower unit price, and what is that price (dollars per ounce)?

This can be represented by the equation 5𝑦0 =65, where 𝑦 represents the sum of the heights of the objects, in meters, in data set B. Therefore, the mean, in meters, of data set C is 41.
